name: Smith&NobleSmartBlinds
0:
”Alexa, turn on Master”
”Alexa, turn on Party”
”Alexa, turn on Good Night”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Amazon Alexa and Smith & Noble work together to help you to easily set custom and convenient routines for your smart home.

Smith & Noble Smart Shade window treatment automation system is an affordable, plug-and-play way to provide shade control, privacy and convenience in your home. Simple voice commands allow you to raise and lower your treatments via pre-determined scenes.

To enable Alexa to control the Smith & Noble Smart Shade system, you need the Smith & Noble Smart Hub (purchase at smithandnoble.com), plus the free Smith & Noble Smart Shades app (available in the Apple App and Google Play stores) to configure your automation. The Smart Hub must be configured before enabling the Alexa skill


There's no need to open your Smith & Noble Smart Shades app to execute the routines for your home. Just say: Alexa.

Try saying:
 "Alexa, raise my shades." 
 "Alexa, Good Morning".
 "Alexa, close bedroom shades".
 "Alexa, watch a movie".

Learn more about how Smith & Noble Smart Shades work: https://www.smithandnoble.com/smart-shades
